name: My love with the GirlsGroup
description:
My love with the Girl Group is more than just a game, it's a fantastic modern fairy tale. From an ordinary Chauffeur to a star-studded girl group agent, you will hold the key to the destiny. Reality and fantasy are intertwined, feel the brand new experience brought by real-life interactive images, rekindle your relationship with your first love, share your heart with the beautiful director when sipping the wine, experience the daily life of a Korean girl group thoroughly, displaying the wonderful destiny shuffle!

1.First-person interactive movie tour, panoramic shooting, real-life interpretation, the entire real-life starring role, allowing you to experience the Korean girl group life without leaving home:


2.Multiple choices, decided by your heart, favorability will rise or fall, your every action will affect the heroines' emotions:


3.Immersive dating experience, enjoy a realistic story and scene that happened in daily life:


4.Many heroines for you to pick, who can get you to fall in love? The option of the love is now given to "you" in front of the screen!
